thoughts.text: The 'river_simulation.py' script is not executing properly due to a syntax error. I will use the 'nano' text editor to open the file and fix the syntax error.

- Locate and fix the syntax error
- Save and exit the text editor
- Make the 'river_simulation.py' script executable using the 'chmod' command
- Run the 'river_simulation.py' script again
